entry_form.name: AS_GSS_CPS_confirmationPageForVendorManualSync
entry_form.description: Manual Sync For Vendor Data from SAM.Gov
called_by: AS GSS Sync Vendor From SAM.GOV

process_model.name: AS GSS Sync Vendor From SAM.GOV

inputs.input_expression: = rule!AS_GSS_CDT_mapDataFromSAMGovToRefVendor( cage: pv!refVendor.cageCode, vendor: pv!refVendor, uniqueEntityId: pv!refVendor.uniqueEntityId)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_QE_getRefBusinessType
expression_rules.description: Returns a list of business type from the reference table for GSS

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_indexPath
expression_rules.description: Pass in a field (i.e. member[1].name) and this will index(index(index( for each field

data.sail_code:
with(
  local!fieldsAndIndices: rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayHandler(field: ri!field),

  reduce(
    index(_, _, ri!indexDefault),
    ri!cdt,
    local!fieldsAndIndices
  )
)
data.definition:
with(
  local!fieldsAndIndices: rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayHandler(field: ri!field),

  reduce(
    index(_, _, ri!indexDefault),
    ri!cdt,
    local!fieldsAndIndices
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_getSamGovRateLimitMessage
expression_rules.description: Returns the message that there's a Sam.gov rate limit and the user should retry

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_queryEntity
expression_rules.description: Helper rule to execute queries with minimal overhead, pass `returnType` based on the query purpose

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_QE_getRefState
expression_rules.description: Returns a list of states from the reference table for GSS

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFields
expression_rules.description: Updates one or more fields of a CDT, with an optional input for indices

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_updateRefVendorDetailsAndCaptureMetadata
expression_rules.description: Updates the CDT fields for AS_GSS_R_Vendor and captures metadata
called_by: AS GSS Sync Vendor From SAM.GOV

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_isBlank
expression_rules.description: Evaluates if the provided value is empty/blank. Returns True or False.

data.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
  length(a!flatten(ri!value)) = 0
)
data.definition:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
  length(a!flatten(ri!value)) = 0
)

test_cases.test_name: Array cast to Any Type with first value null

called_by: AS GSS Sync Vendor From SAM.GOV

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_displayDynamicLabel
expression_rules.description: Displays a label for the input key based on the properties file for GSS

data.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  a!localVariables(
    local!bundle: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null()),
    rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
      bundle: local!bundle,
      bundleKey: ri!bundleKey,
      arguments: ri!arguments
    )
  )
)
data.definition:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  a!localVariables(
    local!bundle: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null()),
    rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
      bundle:  local!bundle,
      bundleKey: ri!bundleKey,
      arguments: ri!arguments
    )
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_populateStateFromSAMGovForVendor
expression_rules.description: Gets the State Code from SAM Gov and populate the value for Vendor as AS_GSS_R_State CDT

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_cast
expression_rules.description: Casts a variable to the type of either the input `type`, or the typeof of the input `typeof`, and properly handles for null inputs

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_CDT_mapDataFromSAMGovToRefVendor
expression_rules.description: Get data from Integrations and map it to AS_GSS_R_Vendor
called_by: AS GSS Sync Vendor From SAM.GOV

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder
expression_rules.description: Loads a property bundle file by name from a folder, returns a dictionary of the key-value pairs

test_cases.test_name: EXCEPTION: It is not possible to have a test case with assertion for this rule

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_QE_getRefVendorDetails
expression_rules.description: Returns ref vendor details based on the filter set applied

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_R_VENDOR,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_R_Vendor',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "vendorRefId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!vendorRefId
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
    field: "vendorRefId",
    ascending: true
  )
)
data.definition:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_R_VENDOR,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_R_Vendor',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "vendorRefId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!vendorRefId
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
    field: "vendorRefId",
    ascending: true
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_populateCountryFromSAMGovForVendor
expression_rules.description: Gets the Country Code  from SAM GOV and populate the value for Vendor as AS_GSS_R_Country CDT

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_QE_getRefCountry
expression_rules.description: Returns a list of countries from the reference table for GSS

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_deepIndex
expression_rules.description: Rule to get the index value. It supports indexing nested CDT values.

expression_rules.name: AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel
expression_rules.description: Displays a label by the `bundleKey` from passed in bundle data, optionally accepts arguments

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByFieldValuePairs
expression_rules.description: Allows passing field-value pairs to handle for use cases where you have to set newValues as arrays

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_populateBusinessTypeFromSAMGovForVendor
expression_rules.description: Gets the Business Type from SAM Gov and populate the value for Vendor as AS_GSS_R_BusinessType CDT

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank
expression_rules.description: A not() wrapped around AS_CO_UT_isBlank

data.sail_code:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
  not(rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!input))
)
data.definition:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
  not(rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!input))
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_captureMetadata
expression_rules.description: Automatically sets the "auditing" fields on a CDT, including createdDatetime/createdBy/modifiedDatetime/modifiedBy/isActive/isDeleted

constants.name: AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
constants.description: OBJECT_ARRAY - Returns an array type of the CDT when passed to rule `AS_CO_UT_queryEntity`

constants.name: AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_SINGLE_OBJECT
constants.description: SINGLE_OBJECT - Returns a single type of the CDT when passed to rule `AS_CO_UT_queryEntity`

constants.name: AS_CO_ENUM_USER_ACTION_CANCEL
constants.description: CANCEL.USER_ACTION - Value to use to drive process logic after a user performs a "Cancel" action
